faqs.question: What kind of roles are you looking for?
faqs.answer: I'm seeking remote AI/ML engineering roles focusing on LLM engineering, multi-agent systems, MLOps/AIOps infrastructure, and production ML pipelines. Open to full-time opportunities, freelance projects, and technical collaborations.

faqs.question: What's your experience with production ML systems?
faqs.answer: I've deployed multiple production ML systems on GCP, AWS, and Azure. My projects include real-time market intelligence agents, crypto trading signal generators, ML monitoring systems with drift detection, and fraud detection pipelines.

faqs.question: Can you work remotely?
faqs.answer: Yes! I'm based in Colombo, Sri Lanka and fully remote-ready with experience in asynchronous collaboration. I'm comfortable working across time zones and have flexible availability.

faqs.question: What's your expertise in LangChain?
faqs.answer: I'm proficient with LangChain, specializing in multi-agent systems and RAG architectures. I've built production systems using LangChain for orchestrating complex AI workflows. I'm also an active open source contributor to the LangChain project.

faqs.question: Do you have MLOps experience?
faqs.answer: Yes, hands-on MLOps experience including FastAPI for ML APIs, Docker containerization, Kubernetes orchestration, MLflow for experiment tracking, Apache Airflow for workflow orchestration, and building automated pipelines with drift detection and monitoring.

faqs.question: Are you currently a student?
faqs.answer: Yes, I'm a 3rd-year student at University of Colombo pursuing dual degrees in IT & Management (with Applied Statistics & Data Science specialization) and BIT from UCSC. However, I've been building production ML systems and contributing to open source alongside my studies.

faqs.question: What makes you different from other AI/ML candidates?
faqs.answer: I focus on production-first engineering rather than just model training. Most AI engineers can train models, but I deploy them at scale, monitor performance, and fix them when they break. I combine statistical rigor from my academic background with practical MLOps expertise.

faqs.question: How can I contact you?
faqs.answer: You can reach me at isuruigic@gmail.com, through LinkedIn at linkedin.com/in/isuruig, via X/Twitter at x.com/Isuru_ig, or check out all my links at linktr.ee/isuruig. I typically respond within 24 hours.

availability.start_date: Immediately available for discussions, flexible start date
availability.work_hours: Flexible, can overlap with US/EU time zones
